title: Sapphire Blue in the Straw
description: Paperback and e-book formats - A clean inspirational romance filled with deep emotion. Description: Jenny had everything a beautiful, sharp-witted, wealthy young woman could want, except one thing - the young man she had loved since high school. Not the smartest. nor most handsome, injured as a child in a car accident that had left him with a permanent limp requiring him to use a cane, Ron had loved Jenny for as long. But that was his secret. And he meant it to remain a secret.
author: Paula Freda
